description: Current status of user accounts in the system
use_cases: Filter users by account status, validate user access, generate user status reports, manage user lifecycle

values.name: active
values.description: User account is active and can access the system

values.name: inactive
values.description: User account is inactive but not permanently disabled

values.name: locked
values.description: User account is locked due to security concerns

values.name: pending_verification
values.description: User account is pending email or identity verification

values.name: terminated
values.description: User account has been permanently terminated
